DOC.brief_title: Aspirin Enalapril Microalbuminuric Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Research design : randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled crossover study Patients : Microalbuminuric ( urinary albumin excretion [ UAE ] 30-300 mg/d ) type 2 diabetes mellitus patient without ischemic heart disease peptic ulcer Aim : To evaluate putative interference low-dose aspirin ( 300 mg/d ) 8 week ) enalapril antiproteinuric property microalbuminuric type 2 diabetes mellitus patient Study protocol : Crossover randomization 8 week enalapril 10 mg/d plus aspirin ( 300 mg/d ) plus placebo , 6-week washout period . Measurement UAE ( immunoturbidimetry ) glomerular filtration rate ( 51Cr-EDTA ) , blood pressure metabolic control baseline end period . Statistical analysis : Bland & Altman analyse crossover trial .
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes mellitus microalbuminuria ischemic heart disease peptic disease
